text: Later this month, Facebook will have to justify its stock's nearly 50% run-up so far this year.

title: Dow Jones Futures: Tesla Deliveries Jump, Fueling Stock; Facebook, Amazon Near Buy Points
text: Dow Jones futures: Tesla soared late as deliveries beat Q2 views. Facebook, Amazon, Zscaler and ServiceNow are closing in on new buy points.

title: What's Next for Facebook (FB) Stock Heading into Q2 2019 Earnings & Beyond?
text: Libra isn't set to launch until 2020. This means investors need to know what to expect from FB now to see if Facebook can maintain its stellar run in the second half of 2019.

title: Suspicious mail sent to Facebook tested negative for sarin
text: A piece of mail flagged as suspicious at a Facebook mailing facility in Menlo Park, California on Monday has been determined as non-hazardous, authorities said.

title: Facebook office gets all-clear after scare over suspicious package
text: A machine at the social network's mail-sorting facility warned of a toxic substance, but tests were negative.

title: Facebook Relaxes Cannabis Ad Policy Just A Tad
text: Facebook, Inc. (NASDAQ: FB) eased its policy on CBD companies advertising on its platform ever so slightly, according to a June 26 report from Digiday.

title: Facebook combats 'miracle cures' and other misleading health claims
text: YouTube is also being bombarded with fake cancer treatment news, report says.

title: Why this economics pro says Trump's war on Big Tech is getting dumber
text: James Pethokoukis, fellow at American Enterprise Institute, joins CNBC's "Squawk Alley" team to discuss his new op-ed calling out President Trump's fight with Big Tech.

title: US isn't ready for Facebook's Libra cryptocurrency, critics argue
text: In an open letter, more than 30 groups urge Congress and regulators to put a hiatus on the company's plans.

title: Facebook's Libra cryptocurrency needs deep thought and detail: UK regulator
text: Facebook's fledging cryptocurrency will raise questions for both society and government that need close examination, a senior official at Britain's financial watchdog said on Tuesday, in  another sign that the planned project will face deep scrutiny.

title: Commentary: Will Facebook's New Cryptocurrency Be A Good Or Bad Thing?
text: FreightWaves features commentary from Market Voices – contributors with unique knowledge of numerous transportation/logistics/supply chain sectors, as well as other critical expertise.

title: Facebook News Feed changes downrank misleading health info and dangerous ‘cures’
text: No, drinking bleach is not a miracle cure for diseases and other conditions — but that’s the sort of bogus health claim that’s floating around the web these days, getting blocked by sites like Amazon and YouTube. Now you can add Facebook to that list of sites taking action — well, kind of!

title: Project Syndicate: Every currency is based on trust, but only a fool would trust Facebook’s cryptocurrency
text: NEW YORK (Project Syndicate) — Facebook and some of its corporate allies have decided that what the world really needs is another cryptocurrency, and that launching one is the best way to use the vast talents at their disposal.

title: Germany fines Facebook for under-reporting complaints
text: German authorities have fined Facebook  2 million euros ($2.3 million) for under-reporting complaints about illegal content on its social media platform in breach of the country's law on internet transparency.

title: Facebook fined for violating German transparency law
text: German authorities have fined Facebook  2 million euros ($2.26 million) for providing a distorted picture of the amount of illegal content on the social media platform, a violation of the country's law on internet transparency.

title: Facebook campus given all-clear after sarin scare
text: Facebook's  Silicon Valley campus received the all-clear on Tuesday after fears that a package at its mail facility contained the nerve agent sarin.
